INSERT INTO mainpage_article ( project_id, project_name, article_id, form_name, regDate, file_name, file_size, img_name, img_size, writer,
writeform1_content,
writeform2_title, writeform2_content, writeform2_latlng,
writeForm3_tasknum, writeForm3_title, writeForm3_status, writeForm3_workersName, writeForm3_start_date, writeForm3_end_date, writeForm3_progress, writeForm3_order, writeForm3_content,
writeForm4_title, writeForm4_start_date, writeForm4_start_time, writeForm4_end_date, writeForm4_end_time, writeForm4_alarm_time, writeForm4_content, writeForm4_latlng,
writeForm5_title, writeForm5_content, writeForm5_date, writeForm5_worker ) VALUES ( 1, 'test_project', article_seq.nextval, #{form_name}, sysdate, #{file_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_size, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img_size, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'test_writer',
#{writeForm1_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{writeForm2_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm2_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm2_latlng, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{writeForm3_tasknum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{writeForm3_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_workersName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_start_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_end_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_progress, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{writeForm3_order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm3_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{writeForm4_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm4_start_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm4_start_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm4_end_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm4_end_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm4_alarm_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm4_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm4_latlng, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{writeForm5_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm5_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm5_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writeForm5_worker, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
